7:"$Sreact.suspense"
3:T81e,<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">üåê Run NGINX as Container</h1>

NGINX is a high-performance web server and reverse proxy. Running it as a container provides flexibility and ease of deployment.
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Quick Start</h2>

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">docker run -d -p 80:80 --name nginx nginx:alpine
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">With Custom Configuration</h2>

<p class="text-gray-700 mb-4 leading-relaxed">Create a <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">docker-compose.yml</code>:</p>

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">version: '3.8'
services:
  nginx:
    image: nginx:alpine
    ports:
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">"80:80"</li>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">"443:443"</li>
    volumes:
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">./nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro</li>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">./html:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro</li>
    restart: unless-stopped
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Dockerfile</h2>

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">FROM nginx:alpine
COPY nginx.conf /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
COPY html/ /usr/share/nginx/html/
EXPOSE 80 443
CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">See Also</h2>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700"><a href="/docs/nginx/ssl" class="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 underline">OpenSSL for Testing</a></li>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700"><a href="/docs/nginx/pam" class="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 underline">PAM Authentication</a></li>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700"><a href="/docs/nginx/static" class="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 underline">Deploy Static App</a></li>
